name: Strike Shooting Killer
description:
Be an excellent commando to transform the war city into a peaceful state. People and innocent citizens were living happily in the city, but terrorists invaded the area and killed the lives.
Let’s accept the challenge to become an army sniper attacker to demolish the bad gang and evil sniper terrorists in the city of battlefield. The city of the normal citizens is in great danger and became terrible fighting war zone. The terrorists and evil mafia gang commandos came in groups to attack and demolish the whole city. They have great huge guns and rifles for shooting; they came along with the great snipers to attack at you from the hidden places. They are the real killers, modern gangsters with heavy weapons, they are fully trained to attack with the perfect target, they have real sniper skills, real challenge fighting will happen in this great battle field.

*Key Features :
• Realistic 3D war environment
• Perfect targets to kill the rivals
• Amazing 3D and HD graphics
• Great battlefield music and sound attacks
• Various challenging missions
• Great sniper rifles to attack in restricted time
